name: Haim J. Wolfson
content: Haim J. Wolfson Haim J. Wolfson Professor of Computer Science Incumbent, the George and Maritza Pionkowski Chair in Computer Aided Drug Design Current Research Computational Structural Biology/Structural Bioinformatics. Model Based Object Recognition in Computer Vision. Spatial Pattern Discovery. Short Biosketch Publications - Google Scholar Profile page Fellowships are available for post-doctoral, Ph.D. and M.Sc. candidates who want to conduct their research in the field of Computational Structural Biology/ Structural Bioinformatics. Highly motivated and gifted B.Sc. students are also welcome. Visit the homepage of my group specializing in Computational Structural Biology / Structural Bioinformatics. --> Useful Links · TAU Bioinfo3D Structural Bionformatics group homepage. · International Society for Computational Biology . · Integrative Structural Biology in Europe - INSTRUCT . · ICORE Excellence Center for Integrated Structural Cell Biology. · CAPRI community wide experiment on the comparative evaluation of protein-protein docking for structure prediction. . Office address: Schreiber bldg., Room 015, Blavatnik School of Computer Science Tel-Aviv University Tel-Aviv 69978 Israel. Phone: +972-3-640 5375 Fax : +972-3-640 6476 E-mail to :
